perfect awkward turtle moment
Yes, I do like Castle, I must confess.
This topic needs more love.  Castle is easily one of the best shows on TV right now!  Fun, lighthearted, great characters, and Nathan Fillion is simply awesome.
Castle is great, glad it got picked up for another season. Nathan Fillion is awesome.
Definitely one of the best crime shows in the last years. Especially because the humor is not integrated in an awkward way like other ones.
hah

I don’t know about _best_ show perhaps, because it is very formulaic, but it is easily one of the most enjoyable and entertaining shows on TV. It's smart, clever and Nathan Fillion is just fan-fucking-tastic the whole time.
Also, I may have a mancrush on Nathan Fillion, but even that aside it's a great show :D
I like it, it is funny. But Castles "perfect" daughter is annoying

I do agree with @jow, it's one of the best crime shows if only for the fact that they're not as standard-fare as all the Law & Order and CSI-type shows. Castle definitely has a lot more of a unique and interesting touch to it.
Not for amusement factor so much, but for being a little more "real" than the average episode
I liked last night's episode a lot.

Aw, I like her. I think she's cast perfectly, but what I don’t so much like is how she (and Martha, his mom) get reused and reused as the mechanism for solving the case or a side-plot all the time. Sometimes it's a metaphor, but it’s always so in-your-face when it is, and sometimes it’s “that one thing she said” giving Castle the pivotal hint. Ugh.

I know the love-tension between them is predictable, but they do keep it on a nice see-saw swing bringing it to the foreground in some episodes, then letting it recede in others. My guess it'll recede a little bit now.
You know, I liked part II of the episode also. Did you? I liked that after the drama was done, the "witty repartee" returned. Nice.
I dont mean that predictable is that bad.. its a part of how its supposed to go.. but i guess i kinda feel for castle and he needs a diversion for a few episodes.. or make it a story arc...

Glad I didn't make this topic earlier, because i was about to... lol.. I like the show alot and last night's episode was great.. although the near misses in the relationship with beckett and castle is starting to get a bit predictable.. there needs to be kind of a shake up with that and soon.
also if anyone can strongarm netflix into insta streaming season one, i would love you for like an hour
